org.fridlund.pacman.cameras

Class PacmanCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fridlund.javalabra.game.cameras.Camera
      • org.fridlund.pacman.cameras.PacmanCamera

  • public class PacmanCamera
extends org.fridlund.javalabra.game.cameras.Camera
    A special GluLookAt camera used in the game of Pacman.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(float delta)
        Rotates the camera, when the rotateLeft or rotateRight methods have been called. Makes sure that the level always are shown by moving it further away during the rotation.
        Overrides:
        update in class org.fridlund.javalabra.game.cameras.Camera
        Parameters:
        delta -

      • applyModelViewMatrix

        public void applyModelViewMatrix(boolean resetMatrix)
        Overrides the default apply model view matrix, with a Glu.gluLookAt call. This makes it possible to rotate around the position the camera is looking at, without the need of hard trigonometry.
        Overrides:
        applyModelViewMatrix in class org.fridlund.javalabra.game.cameras.Camera
        Parameters:
        resetMatrix -

      • applyProjectionMatrix

        public void applyProjectionMatrix()
        Makes the camera have a GluPerspective projection matrix, that enables the depth vision. By default is the game using an Orthographic projection matrix.
        Specified by:
        applyProjectionMatrix in class org.fridlund.javalabra.game.cameras.Camera

      • rotateLeft

        public void rotateLeft()
        Defines the rotation direction. Used when Pacman eats the cherries

      • rotateRight

        public void rotateRight()
        Eefines the rotation direction. Used when Pacman eats the apple.

      • getAngle

        public float getAngle()
        Returns:
